text: David Patrick Maxwell Fyfe, 1st Earl of Kilmuir, (29 May 1900 – 27 January 1967), known as Sir David Maxwell Fyfe from 1942 to 1954 and as Viscount Kilmuir from 1954 to 1962, was a British Conservative politician, lawyer and judge. During his political career, he was the Solicitor General, Attorney General, Home Secretary and Lord High Chancellor of Great Britain. ==Bibliography== *Obituaries: **The Times, 28 January 1967 **The Guardian, 28 January 1967 * * *Dutton, D. J. (2004)"Fyfe, David Patrick Maxwell, Earl of Kilmuir (1900–1967)", Oxford Dictionary of National Biography, Oxford University Press, accessed 4 Aug 2007 * *Lord Kilmuir (1964) Political Adventure * *Tusa, A. & Tusa, J. title: David Maxwell Fyfe, 1st Earl of Kilmuir
